description: I changed the instrument on the vocals and corrected some shortcomings in it

description:
Changed bass to fingered (Victoria plays it this way), fixed the bridge bass according to an instrumental version of the song, added hammer-ons to the chorus bass, changed track names, removed lead-in measures at the beginning. 
Bass still has some room for improvement, it's a bit hard to tell the exact notes with that overdrive.
title: ZITTI E BUONI

description: This is not a revision, this is a new version of the song.
title: ZITTI E BUONI

description: Restored the updated bass tab from the previous revision, adjusted volumes, slightly adjusted BPM, removed one misplaced measure before the 2nd verse
title: ZITTI E BUONI

description:
Added complete guitar and bass tracks.
Drum tracks need a lot of work. I am not a drummer so I did the best that I could, but I gave up halfway.
title: ZITTI E BUONI
